EmailTemplate.name: Mass New Users Email Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Access for the Land O Lakes/Winfield/Purina/Dairy Customer Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!userName},
Thank you for registering for bussiness link. Your registration is almost complete.
Your user ID/UserName is: {!userId}.
After setting the password, you will be authorized to have access to your applications.
Please set your password at:
{!resetUrl}
Please log into the application at the Business Link portal.
If you have any questions or concerns, please call us toll free at 1-866-270-4706 or email at websitesupport@landolakes.com. Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you in the future.
Sincerely,
Business Link
